messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Enemy communication intercepted. Security level elevated.

A summary has been copied and printed to all communications consoles.

messages.author: Captain's Announcement
messages.body: Traitors, give me sleeping carp for a special surprise

messages.author: Head of Security's Desk
messages.body: Crime isss now illegal, by order of law of ssspace and ssstuff.

messages.author: Captain's Announcement
messages.body: If you are non-engineer, you must get a stamped 'Insul Pass' from security, if you plan on carrying insulated gloves.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Anomaly Alert

Localized hyper-energetic flux wave detected on long range scanners. Expected location: Xenobiology Lab.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Electrical Storm Alert

An electrical storm has been detected in your area, please repair potential electronic overloads.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Anomaly Alert

Gravitational anomaly detected on long range scanners. Expected location: Auxillary Base.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Anomaly Alert

Gravitational anomaly detected on long range scanners. Expected location: Kitchen.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Anomaly Alert

Pyroclastic anomaly detected on long range scanners. Expected location: Quartermaster's Office.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Central Command Medium-Priority Update

Based on our omnipotence, we believe that one of the station's animals/bots has developed very low level intelligence, and the ability to communicate.

messages.author: Captain's Announcement
messages.body: BSA-33 Bluespace Artillery is the objective! Warden here.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Anomaly Alert

Localized high-intensity vortex anomaly detected on long range scanners. Expected location: Starboard Bow Maintenance

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Incoming Message

Incoming subspace communication. Secure channel opened at all communication consoles.
